name: UITraitCollection
desc: The iOS interface environment for your app, including traits such as horizontal and vertical size class, display scale, and user interface idiom.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a trait collection whose traits are set to their default (unspecified) values.

items.name: init(traitsFrom: [UITraitCollection])
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that consists of traits merged from a specified array of trait collections.

items.name: init(userInterfaceIdiom: UIUserInterfaceIdiom)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only a specified interface idiom.

items.name: init(horizontalSizeClass: UIUserInterfaceSizeClass)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only a specified horizontal size class.

items.name: init(verticalSizeClass: UIUserInterfaceSizeClass)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only a specified vertical size class.

items.name: init(userInterfaceStyle: UIUserInterfaceStyle)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified user interface style trait.

items.name: init(accessibilityContrast: UIAccessibilityContrast)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified accessibility contrast trait.

items.name: init(userInterfaceLevel: UIUserInterfaceLevel)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified user interface level trait.

items.name: init(legibilityWeight: UILegibilityWeight)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified legibility weight trait.

items.name: init(forceTouchCapability: UIForceTouchCapability)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only a specified force touch capability trait.

items.name: init(displayScale: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only a specified display scale.

items.name: init(displayGamut: UIDisplayGamut)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified display gamut trait.

items.name: init(layoutDirection: UITraitEnvironmentLayoutDirection)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified layout direction trait.

items.name: init(preferredContentSizeCategory: UIContentSizeCategory)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified content size category trait.

items.name: init(activeAppearance: UIUserInterfaceActiveAppearance)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection that contains only the specified active appearance trait.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a trait collection from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: class var current: UITraitCollection
items.desc: The complete set of traits for the current environment.

items.name: var horizontalSizeClass: UIUserInterfaceSizeClass
items.desc: The horizontal size class of the trait collection.

items.name: var verticalSizeClass: UIUserInterfaceSizeClass
items.desc: The vertical size class of the trait collection.

items.name: enum UIUserInterfaceSizeClass
items.desc: Constants that indicate the size class of a view.

items.name: var displayScale: CGFloat
items.desc: The display scale of the trait collection.

items.name: var displayGamut: UIDisplayGamut
items.desc: The gamut of the current display.

items.name: enum UIDisplayGamut
items.desc: Constants that indicate the gamut of the current display.

items.name: var userInterfaceStyle: UIUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: The style associated with the user interface.

items.name: enum UIUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: Constants that indicate the interface style for the app.

items.name: var userInterfaceIdiom: UIUserInterfaceIdiom
items.desc: The user interface idiom of the trait collection.

items.name: enum UIUserInterfaceIdiom
items.desc: Constants that indicate the interface type for the device or an object that has a trait environment, such as a view and view controller.

items.name: var userInterfaceLevel: UIUserInterfaceLevel
items.desc: The elevation level of the interface.

items.name: enum UIUserInterfaceLevel
items.desc: Constants that indicate the visual level for content in the window.

items.name: var layoutDirection: UITraitEnvironmentLayoutDirection
items.desc: The layout direction associated with the current environment.

items.name: enum UITraitEnvironmentLayoutDirection
items.desc: Constants that indicate the layout direction associated with the current environment.

items.name: var accessibilityContrast: UIAccessibilityContrast
items.desc: The accessibility contrast associated with the current environment.

items.name: enum UIAccessibilityContrast
items.desc: Constants that indicate the accessibility contrast setting.

items.name: var legibilityWeight: UILegibilityWeight
items.desc: The font weight to apply to text.

items.name: enum UILegibilityWeight
items.desc: Constants that indicate the weight to apply to text in your interface.

items.name: var activeAppearance: UIUserInterfaceActiveAppearance
items.desc: A property that indicates whether the user interface has an active appearance.

items.name: enum UIUserInterfaceActiveAppearance
items.desc: Constants that indicate whether the user interface has an active appearance.

items.name: var forceTouchCapability: UIForceTouchCapability
items.desc: The force touch capability value of the trait collection.

items.name: enum UIForceTouchCapability
items.desc: Keys that indicate the availability of 3D Touch on a device.

items.name: var preferredContentSizeCategory: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: The font sizing option preferred by the user.

items.name: struct UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: Constants that indicate the preferred size of your content.

items.name: func containsTraits(in: UITraitCollection?) -> Bool
items.desc: Queries whether a trait collection contains all of another trait collectionâ€™s values.

items.name: func hasDifferentColorAppearance(comparedTo: UITraitCollection?) -> Bool
items.desc: Queries whether changing between the specified and current trait collections would affect color values.

items.name: var imageConfiguration: UIImage.Configuration
items.desc: An image configuration object compatible with this trait collection.

items.name: func performAsCurrent(() -> Void)
items.desc: Executes custom code using the traits of the current trait collection.
